sqlMap.select:
SELECT mr.invoiceid, mr.status, mr.supplierId, mr.mpTypeId, mr.amount, mr.returnPrice, mr.totalMoney, mr.inputUserId, mr.inputDate, mr.checkDate, mr.checkUserId, mr.remark, mr.orgId, sup.supName, mt.mobTypeName, e1.empName AS inputUserName, e2.empName AS checkUserName, org.deptName AS orgName FROM sup_mobreturn AS mr Left Join bas_supplier AS sup ON mr.supplierId = sup.supId Left Join bas_mobtype AS mt ON mr.mpTypeId = mt.mobTypeId Left Join sys_users AS u1 ON mr.inputUserId = u1.userId Left Join basic_emp AS e1 ON u1.userId = e1.userId Left Join sys_users AS u2 ON mr.checkUserId = u2.userId Left Join basic_emp AS e2 ON u2.userId = e2.userId Inner Join basic_dept AS org ON mr.orgId = org.deptId
mr.orgId=#orgScope[]#
mr.inputDate >= #startDate#
mr.inputDate <= #endDate#
sup.supTypeId=#mobReturn.supTypeId#
mr.supplierid=#mobReturn.supplierid#
mt.brand=#mobReturn.brand#
mr.mobtypeid=#mobReturn.mptypeid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into sup_mobreturn (invoiceid, status, supplierId, mpTypeId, amount, returnPrice, totalMoney, inputUserId, inputDate, checkDate, checkUserId, remark, orgId) values (#invoiceid:VARCHAR#, #status:INTEGER#, #supplierid:VARCHAR#, #mptypeid:VARCHAR#, #amount:INTEGER#, #returnprice:DECIMAL#, #totalmoney:DECIMAL#, #inputuserid:VARCHAR#, #inputdate:TIMESTAMP#, null, null, #remark:VARCHAR#, #orgid:VARCHAR#)
